name: Spring T-shirt
description: Beautiful T-shirt. 100% combed ringspun cotton. The perfect fabric for a graphic tee and the softest in the business.

name: Long Sleeve Button Front Comfort FLEX Shirt
description: A no-fuss everyday essential, this shirt features no wrinkle technology to keep you looking freshly pressed straight from the dryer.

name: Casual Dress
description: Midi dresses for women will make you feel at your best regardless of whether you wear it to a grocery store or to a social event. To create this dress, we used viscose of the highest quality.

name: Charcoal and Clay Mask
description: Different skin types react uniquely to the changes in their environment and toxins and impurities can collect over time in our skin. Similar to a peel off mask, our cream-base mask works through your face to exfoliate, cleanse, smoothen, and provide antioxidants for healthier looking skin.

name: SEPHORA Face Mask
description: Each of these masks is infused with a different active ingredient for relaxing the skin and achieving a brighter, more revitalized complexion. The fiber masks perfectly hug facial contours for better penetration of the active ingredients. Honey Mask: Nourishes and balances to soothe and refresh dry or sensitive skin.

name: Roodie Pet Pouch Hoodie
description: Roodie is the perfect pet carrier hoodie / sweater for every small animal lover.
